New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the first Indian and only second in the world to score 1000 runs in T20Is in a calendar year
Ashwin surpassed Jasprit Bumrah to become the third-highest leading wicket-taker for India in T20Is
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma fell early to Blessing Muzarabani
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli looked good in the middle order
Suryakumar Yadav played a gem of a knock and accelerated with Hardik Pandya
Rishabh Pant departed early to Ryan Burl
KL Rahul hit his second consecutive fifty in the T20 World Cup
Virat Kohli was caught at long on
Hardik Pandya fell to a slower ball
Pre-Game Insights: India opted to bat first against Zimbabwe
Rohit Sharma became the third Indian captain to lead India in 50 T20Is
Rishabh Pant played ahead of Dinesh Karthik
Pakistan had already reached the semis of the T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: India topped Group 2 with 8 points from 5 matches
India will face England in the second semi-final in Adelaide on 10th November
The semifinals and the final are the biggest stages of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the MCG offered good bounce and was a decent track for the batters
There was a slight chance of a shower in Melbourne but the match was set to go ahead
The Indian fans had reached in big numbers for the match
